name: Task Reassignment
description: Sent when a user reassigns a provisioning task for a different user to complete.
subject: A task has been reassigned
body:
${requester} has reassigned a task from ${previousOwner} to ${newOwner} for ${userName}'s ${source} account.

${newOwner} can find this task within the Task Manager.

Thanks,
The ${PRODUCT_NAME} Team
